title: Vaccinations
description: Regent Medical Care provides comprehensive health care, including Urgent and Family Care, Chiropractic, Physical Therapy and Massage Therapy
cleaned_text: staying healthy and preventing the spread of disease. Vaccinations We Provide - Flu - Tetanus - Pneumonia - Shingles - Whooping cough - Adacel - Prevnar 13 - Covid-19 vaccination- Moderna/ Pfizer/ J and J . Please fill out [this form](https://regentmedicalcare.com/images/uploads/Covid-19 screening and consent28.pdf)and call our office to make your appointment. Please bring the form, ID and insurance card to your appointment or email to us at [regentmedical@yahoo.com](mailto:regentmedical@yahoo.com?subject=Covid-19%20vaccine%20appointment) For questions about our services, please call us today at (602) 494-7700.
